evidence.claim: All at Home Health Care uses AWS for cloud services, including Lambda and S3 for application development.
The company supports FHIR API for health data interoperability, facilitating connections with EHRs.
They employ HL7 V2.5 standards for medical data exchange, which is crucial for health-care integrations.
X12 transaction sets such as 835 and 270 are implemented for billing and eligibility verification.
Integration patterns like RESTful APIs are documented in the developer section of their website.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 for claims and has integration for APIs, aligned with target use cases.
matched_use_cases: Integration with payers for claims processing
